ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research was supported by the Czech Science Foundation [Project 18-01486S], the long-term development program RVO 61388971, and the Ministry of Agriculture of the Czech Republic [Grant Number MZe RO0418]. We are grateful to David Püshel for organizing the substrate set up, Hana Hršelová for contribution to establishment and harvest of the experiment and participation on DNA extraction, Jan Jansa for providing AM fungal inoculum, and Alois Honěk for providing F. pratensis seeds.
